title: Windows 11 build 22593 still doesnâ€™t include File Explorer tabs, but there are a lot of fixes
content:
After an unusual week where we didn’t get a new build of Windows 11 for Insiders, Microsoft is back at it again this week with build 22593. Just like the last one, this build is available in both the Dev and Beta channels of the Insider program. Despite being two weeks since the last build,

The post Windows 11 build 22593 still doesn’t include File Explorer tabs, but there are a lot of fixes appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is rolling out Windows 11 build 22593 to Windows Insiders in the Dev and Beta channels, and it includes a ton of fixes.
